schema.title: TubularComponent
schema.description: Well Tubular data contains information on the tubular assemblies and their components for the well, wellbore, or wellbore completion (as appropriate). The tubulars can be tubing, casing or liners or other related equipment which is installed into the well. Tubulars can also be equipment which is lowered into the well in the context of drilling, which is then pulled back out.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The name of this tubular component.

ParentWellboreID.title: Parent Wellbore Identifier
ParentWellboreID.description: Identifier of the wellbore the Component is standing in.

ParentAssemblyID.title: Parent Assembly Identifier
ParentAssemblyID.description: Identifier of the Assembly the component is taking part on.

TubularComponentSequence.title: Sequence Number
TubularComponentSequence.description: The sequence within which the components entered the hole. That is, a sequence number of 1 entered first, 2 entered next, etc.

TubularComponentNominalSize.title: Nominal Size
TubularComponentNominalSize.description: Nominal size (diameter) of the component, e.g. 9.625", 12.25

MaximumOuterDiameter.title: Outer Diameter Maximum
MaximumOuterDiameter.description: This is the maximum hard outer diameter of the component.

DriftDiameter.title: Drift Diameter
DriftDiameter.description: The drift diameter is the inside diameter (ID) that the pipe manufacturer guarantees per specifications. Note that the nominal inside diameter is not the same as the drift diameter but is always slightly larger. The drift diameter is used by the well planner to determine what size tools or casing strings can later be run through the casing, whereas the nominal inside diameter is used for fluid volume calculations such as mud circulating times and cement slurry placement calculations.

InnerDiameter.title: Inner Diameter
InnerDiameter.description: Nominal inner diameter of the component.

ManufacturerID.title: Manufacturer Identifier
ManufacturerID.description: Unique identifier for the manufacturer of this equipment.

SupplierID.title: Supplier Identifier
SupplierID.description: Unique identifier for the supplier of this equipment.

Model.title: Model Name
Model.description: Name of the component Model as defined per the operating company

SerialNumber.title: Serial Number
SerialNumber.description: Serial Number of the component as provided by the manufacturer and/or the supplier

TubularComponentTypeID.title: Pipe Component Type Identifier
TubularComponentTypeID.description: Specifies the types of components that can be used in a tubular string. These are used to specify the type of component and multiple components are used to define a tubular string (Tubular).

TubularComponentMaterialTypeID.title: Material Type Identifier
TubularComponentMaterialTypeID.description: Specifies the material type constituting the component.

TubularComponentTubingGradeID.title: Tubular Grade Identifier
TubularComponentTubingGradeID.description: Id of tubing grade - eg. the tensile strength of the tubing material. A system of classifying the material specifications for steel alloys used in the manufacture of tubing.

TubularComponentTubingGradeStrength.title: Tubular Grade Strength
TubularComponentTubingGradeStrength.description: The tensile strength of the tubing material. A system of classifying the material specifications for steel alloys used in the manufacture of tubing.

TubularComponentTubingStrength.title: Yield Strength
TubularComponentTubingStrength.description: The axial load required to yield the pipe.

PilotHoleSize.title: Pilot Hole Size
PilotHoleSize.description: Size/diameter of the Pilot Hole when assembly is a drillstring

TubularComponentBoxPinConfigID.title: Box/Pin Configuration Identifier
TubularComponentBoxPinConfigID.description: ID of Reference Object for type of collar used to couple the tubular with another tubing string.

TubularComponentTopConnectionTypeID.title: Top Connection Type Identifier
TubularComponentTopConnectionTypeID.description: Id of the Top Connection Type

TubularComponentBottomConnectionTypeID.title: Bottom Connection Type Identifier
TubularComponentBottomConnectionTypeID.description: Id of the Bottom Connection Type

TubularComponentTopMD.title: Component Top Measured Depth
TubularComponentTopMD.description: The measured depth of the top from the specific component

TubularComponentBaseMD.title: Component Base Measured Depth
TubularComponentBaseMD.description: The measured depth of the base from the specific component

TubularComponentTopReportedTVD.title: Component Top True Vertical Depth
TubularComponentTopReportedTVD.description: Depth of the top of the component measured from the Well-Head

TubularComponentBaseReportedTVD.title: Component Base True Vertical Depth
TubularComponentBaseReportedTVD.description: Depth of the base of the component measured from the Well-Head

PackerSetDepthTVD.title: Packer Set True Vertical Depth
PackerSetDepthTVD.description: The depth the packer equipment was set to seal the casing or tubing.

ShoeDepthTVD.title: Shoe True Vertical Depth
ShoeDepthTVD.description: True vertical depth of the casing/tubing shoe measured from the surface.

NumJoints.title: #Joints
NumJoints.description: Number of Joints per pipe section

IsThreadLockUsed.title: Is Thread Lock Used
IsThreadLockUsed.description: Is thread lock used when mating up the pipe?

VendorNumber.title: Vendor Number
VendorNumber.description: Vendor number or other reference identifier
